flawed_nl_solution:
Anthony lost 6 pets, so he has 16 - 6 = <<16-6=14>>14 pets left.
Then 1/5 * 14 = <<1/5*14=14/5>>14/5 died from old age.
So, Anthony now has 14 - 14/5 = <<14-14/5=56/5>>56/5 pets.
#### 56/5

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 10, not 14. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
